channel.title: Declaring public boolean wear
channel.description: I'm trying to make items donator only, but my source doesn't contain that, and I need it, was just wondering if someone could give me all of the parts.

item.title: Declaring public boolean wear
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:7, topic:357857”][quote author=free wayne link=topic=454365.msg3331681#msg3331681 date=1283535585]
yeah, still a bit confused…
what defines the fact that he’s “wearing” it? you can’t just typed if wear=true

it doesn’t know what wear means. how do i define that?
[/quote]I know im just saying that’s the basic concept; Find the variable for wearing your server uses.
p.s. Rixx suxx my ballss[/quote]Rixx is correct though…

Read full topic

item.title: Declaring public boolean wear
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:4, topic:357857”]Yeah i supposed you could do that

If (wearID=#### & c.donator == 0) {
}[/quote]

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:2, topic:357857”]declare public boolean wear = false; and apon logging in check if they are a donator or not
e.g.

if (donator >= 1) { wear = true; } else { return; }

then on a items click case you can put:

if (wear = true) { //wear code... } else { sM("You must be a donator to wear this item."); }[/quote]
Please learn the slightest of Java programming before you help others. Thanks.

Read full topic

item.description:

Yeah i supposed you could do that

If (wearID=#### & c.donator == 0) {
}

item.title: Declaring public boolean wear
item.dc:creator: @free_wayne free wayne
item.description:
@free_wayne wrote:

wear code would be something like…

(wearID=#### && c.donator == 0)

or whatever, right?

Read full topic

item.title: Declaring public boolean wear
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

declare public boolean wear = false; and apon logging in check if they are a donator or not
e.g.

if (donator >= 1) { wear = true; } else { return; }

then on a items click case you can put:

if (wear = true) { //wear code... } else { sM("You must be a donator to wear this item."); }

Read full topic
